p:
Both the virus-encoded proteases 3CLpro and PLproÂ are involved in the processing of the two viral polyproteins in a coordinated manner, and thus comprise important drug targets. The structure, function, and inhibition of CoV 3CLpro (also called Mpro) has been recently comprehensively reviewed.
6 The 3CLpro is a cysteine protease that cleaves and processes the viral polyproteins.
